text:
Alina Rai is a British-Indian model and fashion blogger. She is best known as a doppelganger to Katrina Kaif and made her debut in Kamaal featuring Bollywood rapper Badshah and singer Guru Randhawa.
Biography.
In December 2017, she started her career as a fashion blogger. Later, she moved to Mumbai from London to be part of Bollywood. Since then she has quickly grabbed a lot of attention and has more than 100k Instagram followers.
In 2020, she was featured in the music video "Haal" and "Taati" by DJ Devil released from Sony Music India.
